data.comment: Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Mimoun Mahi.
In the minute 40, Great play from Django Warmerdam to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Finn Stokkers with Vitalie Damascan.
Morad el Haddouti is replacing James Efmorfidis for the away team.
Goal! Waalwijk go level at 1-1 through Vitalie Damascan in Utrecht.
In the minute 59, Anas Tahiri instrumental with a fine assist.
Utrecht make their first substitution with Urby Emanuelson replacing Mimoun Mahi.
John van den Brom is making the team's second substitution at Stadion Galgenwaard with Daniel Arzani replacing Bart Ramselaar.
In the minute 70, Sylla Sow is replacing Lennerd Daneels for Waalwijk at Stadion Galgenwaard.
Goal! Utrecht have got their heads in front thanks to a Gyrano Kerk strike.
Eljero Elia is on a sub for Othman Boussaid for Utrecht.
In the minute 82, Waalwijk make their fourth substitution with Cyril Ngonge replacing Nicolas Olsak.
Sander Van de Streek scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 3-1.
Daniel Arzani with an assist there.
